description:
This resource allows you to create and manage hooks for your GitLab projects.
For further information on hooks, consult the [gitlab
documentation](https://docs.gitlab.com/ce/user/project/integrations/webhooks.html).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

EnableSslVerification.description:
Enable ssl verification when invoking
the hook.

IssuesEvents.description: Invoke the hook for issues events.

JobEvents.description: Invoke the hook for job events.

MergeRequestsEvents.description: Invoke the hook for merge requests.

NoteEvents.description: Invoke the hook for notes events.

PipelineEvents.description: Invoke the hook for pipeline events.

Project.description: The name or id of the project to add the hook to.

PushEvents.description: Invoke the hook for push events.

TagPushEvents.description: Invoke the hook for tag push events.

Token.description: A token to present when invoking the hook.

Url.description: The url of the hook to invoke.

WikiPageEvents.description: Invoke the hook for wiki page events.
